HediffDef.label: storing cadmium
HediffDef.description: This pawn is storing breath in a cadmium metalmind, constricting their airflow. They breathe shallowly, tire more easily, and may suffer from shortness of breath during strenuous activity — but the stored air may save them later.

HediffDef.label: tapping cadmium
HediffDef.description: This pawn is tapping a cadmium metalmind, drawing on stored reserves of air. They can function without breathing for extended periods, shrug off smoke or gas effects, and resist asphyxiation far longer than normal.
